summary: Tab Restructuring Testing Complete - All 14 tabs verified. Navigation correctly shows 14 tabs (reduced from 18). Pipeline tab (renamed from Sales CRM) displays sales pipeline content. Knowledge tab has 4 sub-tabs (SOPs, Training, Templates, Resources) with correct content. Removed tabs (Library, Trainings, Templates standalone, AI Scanner) are not present in navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: NAV_ITEMS array correctly contains 14 tabs as expected
Pipeline tab correctly renamed from Sales CRM and displays SalesCRM component
Knowledge tab properly integrates merged content from removed tabs
Knowledge sub-tabs (SOPs, Training, Templates, Resources) all functional
Templates sub-tab correctly shows nested tabs: Playbooks, SOP Templates, Contract Templates
Resources sub-tab displays 3 resource categories: Policy Documents, User Guides, Shared Resources
Training sub-tab correctly renders TeamTrainings component
context_for_next_testing_agent: Tab restructuring from 18 to 14 tabs complete. The 14 tabs are: Dashboard, Workflows, Pipeline, Contracts, Execution, Messages, Alerts, Affiliates, Client Portal, Bidding, Knowledge, Analytics, Team, Settings. Knowledge tab contains 4 sub-tabs: SOPs (with categories and AI assistant), Training (TeamTrainings component), Templates (Playbooks, SOP Templates, Contract Templates), Resources (Policy Documents, User Guides, Shared Resources). Removed tabs: Library, Trainings, Templates (standalone), AI Scanner - all merged into Knowledge tab.
